    • Field Detail

      • backgroundLoading

        public static boolean backgroundLoading
        If to use JavaFX BackgroundLoading, see also Image. Default: false

      • prefix

        public static java.lang.String prefix
        The preferred prefix. Default: "img"

      • extension

        public static java.lang.String extension
        The preferred extension (only needed for writing actions). Default: "png"

    • Method Detail

      • readImageFormatted

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image readImageFormatted(FileObject fileObject)
        Same as readImage(FileObject) but applies also the image prefix to the fileObject before reading!
        Parameters:
        fileObject -
        Returns:

      • readImage

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image readImage(FileObject fileObject)
        Reads an image. Doesn't throw an exception because even if the image is not found it returns a transparent one (of one pixel).
        Parameters:
        fileObject - The image to retrieve. The extension can be omitted.
        Returns:
        Returns the found image or a transparent one.

      • writeImage

        public static boolean writeImage(FileObject destination,
                                 javafx.scene.image.Image toWrite)
        Writes an image object to the destination. Overwrites existing files.
        Parameters:
        destination - The destination FileObject. The prefix and extension are overwritten with the default one, see also prefix and extension
        toWrite -
        Returns:
        Returns true on success or false if the image could not be saved.

      • copyImage

        public static void copyImage(FileObject source,
                             FileObject destination)
        Copies image by reading the source readImage(FileObject) and writing it to the destination. See also writeImage(FileObject, Image)
        Parameters:
        source -
        destination -

      • deleteImageFormatted

        public static void deleteImageFormatted(FileObject destination)
        Removes an image and applies the prefix.
        Parameters:
        destination -

      • deleteImage

        public static void deleteImage(FileObject destination)
        Removes an image and applies the prefix.
        Parameters:
        destination -

      • getPane

        public static javafx.scene.layout.HBox getPane(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
        Returns a HBox which has as background an image. The image is sized to the full size of the HBox. Use readImage(FileObject) or readImageFormatted(FileObject) to pass the image parameter.
        Parameters:
        image - The image which should be stretched to the full background of the HBox.
        Returns:
        Returns a HBox with the image put into Region.setBackground(Background) of the HBox.
